Multisensory VR experience
Coco Health

April 2018 - September 2018

Project Description

CocoHealth is a counseling business run by a Kellogg MBA student. The client approached me with zero visual assets and branding material, and I built his website from start to finish: designing and developing everything you see on the website.

outcome

CocoHealth's brand was strengthened with a robust digital presence that displays reliability, empathy, and professionalism.

what i learned

I gained real-world experience of delivering a functional product to a client, working under tight deadlines to meet their needs. I also learned best practices for responsive design and development using custom CSS.

visit the website
